name: Rante
goal: Rante provides cloud-based compliance solutions for governments, particularly tax authorities, and financial institutions to address data exchanges and to combat tax evasion, money-laundering, and sanction violations.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Automatic Exchange of Information (AEOI)
VAT compliance and data exchanges
sanction compliance
